acceptance-test-run.title: Memoization should work correctly for collections and arrays
acceptance-test-run.name: memoizationShouldWorkCorrectlyForCollectionsAndArrays

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.MemoizationPojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the given array should not be null or empty and contain elements of type U6FIwACtrd
Then the collection should have exactly rqwYrZsXmR elements
Then the collection should not be null or empty and each element should be of type 7wzn1ciMf4
Then the two objects 5 and 5 should be equal
Then the Map should not be null or empty and each element should have key of type QJ8PtIELG8=2SoxFyKoYc and value of type dse5ct8Y8V=_NnrcdRmnd
Then the two objects 5 and 5 should be equal
